tika-s0403t6:2_0: 61-65. Dutiyassa paṭhame “mahapphalā mahānisaṁsā”ti ubhayampetaṁ atthato ekaṁ, byañjanameva
tika-s0403t6:2_2: phalapariyāyopi hoti. Mahato lokuttarassa sukhassa paccayā hontīti mahānisaṁsā. Amatogadhāti
tika-s0403t6:2_3: amatabbhantarā amataṁ anuppaviṭṭhā nibbānadiṭṭhattā, tato paraṁ na gacchanti. Tena
tika-s0403t6:2_4: vuttaṁ “amatapariyosānā”ti. Amataṁ pariyosānaṁ avasānaṁ etāsanti amatapariyosānā.
tika-s0403t6:2_5: Maraṇasaññāti maraṇānupassanāñāṇena saññā. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti āhāraṁ gamanādivasena
tika-s0403t6:2_6: paṭikūlato pariggaṇhantassa uppannasaññā. Ukkaṇṭhitassāti nibbindantassa katthacipi
tika-s0403t6:5_0: 66-70. Chaṭṭhe saha ājīvanti etthāti sājīvo, pañhassa pucchanaṁ vissajjanañca. Tenāha
tika-s0403t6:5_1: “sājīvoti pañhapucchanañceva pañhavissajjanañcā”tiādi. Abhisaṅkhatanti citaṁ. Sattamādīni uttānatthāneva.
